about.header: Who are we and how did we get here?
team: In early 2020, Dani developed the idea and enlisted Ben to help with outreach, design, and web development. Throughout Summer 2020, Lars, Mack and Cash all joined to work on the UX research, development, and content design.
This small but mighty team is extremely motivated, passionate, and talented. Mental health is a cause close to all of our hearts. Click the cards below to read more!

splash.header: Striving for better mental health experiences for all.
